title: Subpart 1728-4 - Purchases And Contracts
content:
Subpart 1728-4 - Purchases And Contracts

State Regulations
§ 1728-4.1 - General
§ 1728-4.2 - Purchases and contracts of less than $100,000
§ 1728-4.3 - Purchases and contracts of $1000,000 or more
§ 1728-4.4 - Occasional and continuing contracts and purchases
§ 1728-4.5 - Professional service contracts for architects, engineers, landscape architects, and environmental consultants
§ 1728-4.6 - Contract documents
§ 1728-4.7 - Identity of interest
§ 1728-4.8 - Commitments in need of further supervision
§ 1728-4.9 - Refinancing and preservation transactions
§ 1728-4.10 - Grant contracts

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
